explains: v. 阻塞（block 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: blocking agent 阻滞剂；封阻剂
blocking device 闸柄闩；锁定装置
blocking high 阻塞高压，阻塞；阻散高压

sentences.en: Riot police with shields were blocking the demonstrators' way.
sentences.cn: 手持盾牌的防暴警察堵住了示威者的路。

sentences.en: The cars blocking the exits could turn this place into a death trap.
sentences.cn: 那些堵住出口的汽车可能使这地方成为死亡陷阱。
坐下，你挡住我的视线了。
